name.description: The name of the role to be executed.

private.description: If True the variables from defaults/ and vars/ in a role will not be made available to the rest of the play.

allow_duplicates.description: Overrides the role's metadata setting to allow using a role more than once with the same parameters.

tasks_from.description: File to load from a Role's tasks/ directory.

vars_from.description: File to load from a Role's vars/ directory.

defaults_from.description: File to load from a Role's defaults/ directory.
